Objective_Description: Hardware requirements comply with system requirements
Hardware requirements are accurate and complete
Hardware requirements include failure condition effects
Hardware requirements are traceable to system requirements
Hardware design complies with hardware requirements
Hardware design is compatible with requirements
Hardware design is traceable to hardware requirements
Design data is accurate and complete
Hardware implementation is compatible with design
Hardware implementation is traceable to design
Derived requirements are defined and justified
Functional testing is complete and correct
Robustness testing is complete and correct
Environmental testing is complete and correct
Test procedures are correct and complete
Test results are correct and discrepancies explained
Test coverage of requirements is achieved
Test coverage of hardware structure is achieved
HDL code is traceable to requirements
HDL code is accurate and consistent

Notes: Tool output verification or tool qualification

Objective_Description: HDL simulation is complete and correct

Notes: Modified Condition/Decision Coverage for DAL A

Objective_Description: Hardware plans are complete and accurate
Notes: PHAC, HDP, HVP, HCMP, HQAP review

Objective_Description: Hardware configuration management process satisfies objectives
Hardware quality assurance process satisfies objectives
Hardware certification liaison process satisfies objectives
Hardware life cycle environment control is established
Hardware configuration management processes are assured
Hardware certification liaison process is assured
Conformity review of certification products is performed
Hardware life cycle data is under configuration control
